channel.title: Mage dosen't hit on pvp, can any1 help
channel.description: ok, so after 4 servers i thought i finally found one with working mage since it worked on npc's. but when i use a mage attack against a player, nothing happens. i'm using cheezscape and i spent 2 days on the server already and considering i've been through 4 servers, and plus i like this one so i'm not just gona get a new server. there has to be some way to fix this, any1 know how?
